scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-http-header-size=24576' next dev -p 3000 & nodemon --watch src/utils/sismo.ts --watch ../src/Airdrop.sol --exec 'yarn compute-tree && yarn deploy-airdrop && sleep 4 && ./script/log.sh'
scripts.register-root: cast rpc anvil_impersonateAccount 0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 && ETH_FROM=0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb cast send 0x5449Cc7A7E4024a7192d70c9Ce60Bb823993fd81 --unlocked --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 'registerRoot(uint256)'
scripts.deploy-airdrop: forge script DeployAirdrop --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast &&  ./script/generate-abi-from-front.sh
